PHRASE.LANG: GST, paquete de baile de K-Pop (mujer)
This dance pack includes three K-Pop style dances; 'Hocus-Pocus', 'Lipgloss' and 'Run, Run, Run'. [#Legal]
De pack Danse comprend trois danses de type K-Pop : Hocus-Pocus, Gloss et Course Folle. [#Legal]
Dieses Tanz-Pack beinhaltet drei Tänze im K-Pop-Stil: 'Hocus-Pocus', 'Lipgloss' und 'Run, Run, Run'. [#Legal]
Questa serie di passi include tre stili di K-pop: 'Abracadabra', 'Lucidalabbra' e 'Corri, corri, corri'. [#Legal]
